Hi this is Ceema and I’m back with a new
lesson on answering a very simple question,

which is what do you do? So when someone asks
you this question, they are trying to get

information about your job or about your work.
So they are very interested in knowing, what

is the job that you are involved in? What
is the work that you are doing, when you go

to your office or whichever place you go to
work at or what is your profession? Now because

the question is simple. The answer also is
equally simple, so when you answer this question,

you can answer it in various ways depending
on the context of your sentence.
So when someone asks you what do you do?

You can answer that by
saying, by starting your sentence, I work

at or I work in or I work for or you can say
I work with, but there are different sentences

and you can use each of these syllables in
a sentence depending on your right sentence

structure. So let’s get you the right set
of sentence structure, when you are going

to answer this question. Now when you use,
I work at or I work for, you are going to

use it, when you are telling someone the name
of the company where you are working for,

so you will say I work for, whatever is the
name of the company and the same goes for

I work for, again you will talk about the
name of the company. So you can say, I work

at Let’s talk Pvt ltd or you can say I work
for Citibank, so work at and work for, will

always be used when you’re talking about,
the name of the company. Now work in, when

do you use work in or work on? It can be used
in several ways, I’ll show you a few ways,

work in can be used to talk about the place
you are working for the exact place you are

working for, now there are several places
we can work in, so under place, you may have,

you can say I work in an office or I work
in a school or I work in a factory or I work

in a boutique 
or I work in a store, could be any store,
retail store or a pharmacy store or I work

on a farm, if you’re a farmer or I work
on a construction site. It could be really

anything. So when you are using your sentence
starting with I work in, it would refer to

a place, which can be an office, an office
can also be a cubical. It’s a little room

that you get for yourself to work and do your
daily work activities or a school or a factory

or a boutique or a store or a farm or a construction
site or anywhere or any place that you work

in, it could be anywhere, now this is the
first usage of the I work in, but I work in

can also be used, when you are talking about
a city or a country. So you can say I work

in Paris or you can say I work in America
or I work in the UK. So I work in is used

for a place, which could include all of these
or maybe more depending on the place that

you are working in or you could say I work
in a city or a country, depending on what

city or country it is, you can also use I
work in, when you are talking about a specific

department of the company. So maybe you can
say, I work in the HR department or I work

in the department of Finance or you can say
I work in the Marketing department. So you

use work in for a place a city or a country
or a specific department in that company.

And the other usage of the I work in can be
used, when you’re talking about a specific

area of expertise. Maybe your profession as
a consultant requires you to consult people,

so therefore your area of expertise is consulting,
so you can say, I work in consulting or I

work in finance or I work in law, law is your
expertise. Now work for can also be used for

another way of talking, so you can use work
for, when you are talking about working for

a or working directly for an important person.
So you can say something like, I work for

Tom Cruise or I work for Steven Spielberg.
So whenever you are working directly for someone,

you will use the word I work for. Now moving
on to using work with, when do you use work

with? Well, work with is used in two different
ways. The first way is when you are talking

about objects of work or the things that you
work with, so if you are working in an office

or a cubical, you work with computers. If
you are working in a boutique, you are working

with clothes or apparels. So it depends on
the things you are working with, the objects

of what you work with, now work with can also
be used when you are talking about specific

kind of people you work with, so for example,
if you are a teacher who works in a school.

You work in a school but you are teaching
special students, so what kind of people do

you work with? You will say, you work with
students with special needs or children with

special needs. So maybe you’ve got to work
with children who are autistic, you’ve gotta

work with children who have OCD or children
who are miserly schizophrenic. So you are

working in a school, but you are working with
children, who have special needs. If you are

say working on a construction site, you’re
working on a construction site, you are working

with what kind of people on a construction
site, you would work with Engineers or perhaps

Architects. So that is how you use, how you
answer, what do you do in four main different

ways. I will show you some more ways of how
to answer, what do you do depending on any

alternative profession that you may have,
now for those of you who don’t have a job,

how would you answer this question? A lot
of people do ask you what do you do? And well

you’re not working, you don’t have a job.
So 
what do you say? You could say, I’m unemployed

or you can say I am between jobs. So these
are the two different ways of answering this

question, if you don’t have a job, because
you’re not working right now. So you can’t

use the I work with or I work for, it’s
not gonna work that way right? So you can

use either of these two statements. Now there
are some of you, the smart ones who work for

yourself, so you are doing something, you’re
an entrepreneur. So if you work for yourself,

had you answer that? You can say I am self-employed.
The word is self-employed or you can say I

own a small business, which is called, whatever
the name of the business is, so these are

the different ways on how you will talk about
your work depending on what you do and what

you don’t do, if you don’t have a job.
Well, that’s it from me on this lesson on

answering the simple question. What do you
do? Now that you know how to answer this question.

I’m sure you will answer it correctly and
in the right context. I’ll be back with

some more lessons. Until then this is me saying
goodbye
